data.eml:eml: Review of Baeolidia, the largest genus of Aeolidiidae (Mollusca: Nudibranchia), with the description of five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carmona, Leila, Pola, Marta, Gosliner, Terrence M., Cervera, Juan Lucas (2014): Review of Baeolidia, the largest genus of Aeolidiidae (Mollusca: Nudibranchia), with the description of five new species. Zootaxa 3802 (4): 477-514, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3802.4.5
